description: Triangle T00, T10, T11, T20, T21, T22, etc. where Tmn = number of distinct products ij with m-n<=i,j<=m.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1890
maple: A027422 := proc(m,n)    local L,i,j ;    L := {};    for i from m-n to m do        for j from i to m do            L := L union {i*j};        end do:    end do:    nops(L);end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 06 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
